extendedInfo.description: Sakura Dragon enwind solitary cherry blossoms in the sunset.Petals of cherry blossoms which dance around is beautiful.Dragon Live Wallpaper*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Dragon Sakura Free*This wallpaper is trial version for one day.The animation does not play after one day.However, if you reinstall, you can use again.Full versionhttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.Wall1SakuraDragonMystery*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Animation is clunky, and it doesn\'t loop well. It should be a much longer and fluid animation, with a seamless loop.
reviews.author: Robbie Keith
